pygcu.api package

Submodules

pygcu.api.odata module

OData logic and helper classes

class pygcu.api.odata.ODataUrl(base_url: str)[source]

Bases: object

Converts a simple url string to be easily manipulated to the OData standards.

Example Usage:

from pygcu.api.odata import ODataUrl

url = ODataUrl("https://example/api")

uri = "workers"
params = {"$skip": 0, "$count": "true", "$filter": "UpdatedDate gt 1990-01-01}

parsed_url = url.parse(uri, params)
print(parsed_url)
# https://example/api/workers?$skip=0&$count=true&$filter=UpdatedDate gt 1990-01-01

TODO: This class needs much building on and made better…

Parameters:

base_url – (str) - Base url to convert into odata url

count(uri: str = '/') → str[source]

helper function to return parsed url to get total counts within entity

Returns:

str

parse(uri: str = '/', params: Dict[str, str] = {}) → str[source]

construct valid odata url with given context

Parameters:

  • uri – (str) - the desired uri /workers for example without base url

  • params – (Dict(str, str)) - a dictionary of key/value pairs that must be valid odata language

Returns:

str

pygcu.api.snowflake module

pygcu.api.templates module

Dedicated to templates and design patterns

class pygcu.api.templates.IngestionTemplate[source]

Bases: object

A template designed for repeatable ingestion pattern by providing skeleton methods that should be defined by designer.

Example Usage

 1import pandas as pd
 2
 3class CustomIngestion(IngestionTemplate):
 4    def pre_extract(self):
 5        pass
 6
 7    def extract(self):
 8        data = get_all_the_data()
 9        df = pd.DataFrame(data)
10        return df
11
12    def post_extract(self, df):
13        df.columns = ("A", "B", "C")
14        df.to_csv("mydata.csv", index=False)
15
16
17ci = CustomIngestion()
18ci.run()
extract() → DataFrame[source]

overwrite method that handles actual pulling of data

Returns:

DataFrame

post_extract(df: DataFrame) → None[source]

post-hook logic after ingestion of data

Parameters:

df – (pd.DataFrame) - Data ingested from IngestionTemplate.extract()

pre_extract() → None[source]

pre-hook logic before actual ingestion takes place, use this to set things up

run() → None[source]

Call this method to kickstart the ingestion
